title: — As in guillotine...
description: Guy LeCharles Gonzalez: As in guillotine. Old/new media pragmatist. Sometimes loud, one-time poet, still opinionated.

title: Ask the Agent
description: I'm Jennifer Laughran. I'm a Senior Agent at the Andrea Brown Literary Agency, representing great authors and illustrators….

title: Jane Friedman | Blog
description: Information and resources for writers, from a 20-year veteran of the publishing industry.

title: Janet Reid, Literary Agent
description: "Never miss a chance to do good"--David Stanley.

title: Publishers Weekly
description: Book Reviews, Bestselling Books & Publishing Business News.

title: Publishing ... and Other Forms of Insanity
description: Erica Verrillo has written seven books and published five. She doesn't know why anyone with an ounce of self-preservation would ever want to publish….

title: Publishing Perspectives
description: News and information about the international book publishing industry, book sales, rights deals, and more.

title: Publishing Trends
description: An incisive monthly newsletter that provides news and opinion on the rapidly changing world of book publishing in all its forms.

title: Writer Beware
description: …shines a bright light into the dark corners of the shadow-world of literary scams, schemes, and pitfalls. Also providing advice for writers, industry news, and commentary.
